languages.text: {n}Выстрел — и дознаватель, дернувшись, оседает в кресле. В то же мгновение в комнате начинает теплеть, а лед и изморозь — таять на глазах.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Выстрел — и дознаватель, дернувшись, оседает в кресле. В то же мгновение в комнате начинает теплеть, а лед и изморозь — таять на глазах.{/n}

languages.text: {n}One shot, and the Interrogator jerks, falling back against the seat. Immediately, the room begins to warm up and the ice and frost melt away to nothing before your eyes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Выстрел — и дознаватель, дернувшись, оседает в кресле. В то же мгновение в комнате начинает теплеть, а лед и изморозь — таять на глазах.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}One shot, and the Interrogator jerks, falling back against the seat. Immediately, the room begins to warm up and the ice and frost melt away to nothing before your eyes.{/n}
{n}One shot, and the Interrogator jerks, falling back against the seat. Immediately, the room begins to warm up and the ice and frost melt away to nothing before your eyes.{/n}
{n}One shot, and the Interrogator jerks, falling back against the seat. Immediately, the room begins to warm up and the ice and frost melt away to nothing before your eyes.{/n}
{n}One shot, and the Interrogator jerks, falling back against the seat. Immediately, the room begins to warm up and the ice and frost melt away to nothing before your eyes.{/n}

languages.text: {n}一声枪响，海因里希抽搐了一下，倒在了椅子上。房间随即开始变暖，冰雪在你眼前消融得无影无踪。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One shot, and the Interrogator jerks, falling back against the seat. Immediately, the room begins to warm up and the ice and frost melt away to nothing before your eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}一声枪响，海因里希抽搐了一下，倒在了椅子上。房间随即开始变暖，冰雪在你眼前消融得无影无踪。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Una sola bala hace que el interrogador caiga contra el respaldo. De inmediato, la sala empieza a calentarse y el hielo y la escarcha se esfuman ante tu mirada.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One shot, and the Interrogator jerks, falling back against the seat. Immediately, the room begins to warm up and the ice and frost melt away to nothing before your eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Una sola bala hace que el interrogador caiga contra el respaldo. De inmediato, la sala empieza a calentarse y el hielo y la escarcha se esfuman ante tu mirada.{/n}

languages.text: {n}一発撃つと、インテロゲイターはびくりと体を震わせ、椅子に倒れこむ。すぐに部屋が暖まり始め、目の前で氷と霜が溶けて消えていく。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One shot, and the Interrogator jerks, falling back against the seat. Immediately, the room begins to warm up and the ice and frost melt away to nothing before your eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}一発撃つと、インテロゲイターはびくりと体を震わせ、椅子に倒れこむ。すぐに部屋が暖まり始め、目の前で氷と霜が溶けて消えていく。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Il vous suffit d'un seul tir. L'interrogateur tressaille, puis s'affaisse dans le fauteuil. Immédiatement, l'air dans la pièce se réchauffe et le gel fond sous vos yeux jusqu'à ce qu'il n'en reste aucune trace.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One shot, and the Interrogator jerks, falling back against the seat. Immediately, the room begins to warm up and the ice and frost melt away to nothing before your eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Il vous suffit d'un seul tir. L'interrogateur tressaille, puis s'affaisse dans le fauteuil. Immédiatement, l'air dans la pièce se réchauffe et le gel fond sous vos yeux jusqu'à ce qu'il n'en reste aucune trace.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ein Schuss und der Interrogator zuckt. Dann sackt er auf dem Stuhl zusammen. Unmittelbar darauf wird es wärmer im Raum und das Eis und der Frost schmelzen vor deinen Augen einfach weg.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One shot, and the Interrogator jerks, falling back against the seat. Immediately, the room begins to warm up and the ice and frost melt away to nothing before your eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein Schuss und der Interrogator zuckt. Dann sackt er auf dem Stuhl zusammen. Unmittelbar darauf wird es wärmer im Raum und das Eis und der Frost schmelzen vor deinen Augen einfach weg.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tek bir atışın ardından Sorgucu, sarsılarak sandalyesinden geriye düşüyor. Oda aniden ısınmaya, gözlerinin önünde tüm o buz ile don eriyip yok olmaya başlıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One shot, and the Interrogator jerks, falling back against the seat. Immediately, the room begins to warm up and the ice and frost melt away to nothing before your eyes.{/n}
